Sweeeet "exotic detail". Good thing I'm not done replacing legacy engines with your engines in my lift fleet yet, since I may be changing fuel tanks, too. Will it fit the RD-275K, too?

Will it fit the RD-275K, too?

of course I try to make my stuff as modular as possible.

RD-0146 matches too. also I forgot I even textured the screws and that they spin when the nozzle extends haha! it is so OTT

An Decided to do an Upper stage configuration of the new URM parts. turned out pretty nice. Also, a long First stage configuration.

That looks familiar....

Horay!
the power and customizibility of URM stuff will only Increase with time I sometimes ponder if going with square engine bases was a good idea. Circle might look a bit better.
Hexes maybe?

Hello,

I'm having an issue on KSP that when I load the ships in the VAB my game just freezes up- Sounds/animations still play and I can click buttons but nothing happens.

?_? help please!! btw I love the pack!
Try removing some mods, sounds like a RAM issue.

I love to see the new Angara parts, but I see you're making them rather small. URM is 3m IRL, in KSP, that would correspond to 2m in diameter. I believe that it'd be better if you make the URMs 2.5m, because of that.

I think it's starting on 1.25m because the current engines are all 1.25m sized

I suspect 2.5m tanks will not arrive until there are some 2.5m engines to pair them with

I love to see the new Angara parts, but I see you're making them rather small. URM is 3m IRL, in KSP, that would correspond to 2m in diameter. I believe that it'd be better if you make the URMs 2.5m, because of that.

as tated before I don't much care about the sizes of things IRL. But don't worry this is URM-125. There will be URM-25 and URM-3

also, I am not sure anyone has caught onto the interesting part of this product

Edited August 23, 2013 by CardBoardBoxProcessor
Could we perhaps coax you to elaborate on this?
Engine fairings?

Could we perhaps coax you to elaborate on this?

I know what he means. URM-125 = URM, 1.25m in diameter. So, there'll be modules in 2.5m and 3m.

Well yes. but he wants to know more about the other stuff. Lets just say more tanks will not equal more RAM space required and you can make (with in the subsets bounds) any length tank you want. the name Universal Rocket Modules means a lot more now

Edited August 24, 2013 by NoMrBond
So say a universal tank size 1,2 and 3; which you can manipulate ingame to become, for example: Upper, Core, Lower, Booster configurations of a base model/texture.......

So say a universal tank size 1,2 and 3; which you can manipulate ingame to become, for example: Upper, Core, Lower, Booster configurations of a base model/texture.......

I m not sure of your question. I am currently working on the URM 125 package. you cannot manipulate it ingame but you can manipulate the cfgs and then reload the game database while the game is running so to say.

i added some alternate LOX lines for smaller stages. The large ones looks weird. I also added the electrical Back Bone pieces. I half want to make alternate large LOX lines and Repressurizing lines but.... I see no point for 1.25m stuff.

PS same ram space according to C7
Wait i haz question, will these new tanks be procedural? u know, editing the height and maybe the width.

Wait i haz question, will these new tanks be procedural? u know, editing the height and maybe the width.

No. They arn't. But you can edit the Cfgs and stack the pieces as you see fit.

if you go through the posted images you will see that the tanks are evoling lol.
